name: PhocusSpaceYourproductivitytimer
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: focus space
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The aim of Phocus Space is to aid you in your productivity whether it is studying, work, or some You Time. You can choose between a 25 minute focus session and a 5 minute break or a 50 minute session and a 10 minute break. There are four work sessions and 3 breaks in each choice.
Each audio track begins with a brief introduction and alarm, followed by silence for the remainder of the time period, allowing you to focus on what you are doing.
How do I use this app?
Upon the skill opening you will be asked if you would like a 25 minute focus session and 5 minute break. If you wish to proceed then say ‘Yes’. If you would like to go for a longer 50 minute session and a 10 minute break say ‘No’ to the 25 minute option. Then say ‘yes’ to the 50 minute option.
You can “pause” and “resume” the skill whenever you please.
You can say “Alexa, Help” before making your session selection for more information on using the skill.
If at any time during your focus session you would like to restart the session, simply say “Alexa, Start Over”.
Happy productivity!

About TL Tech and our other skills
We are on a mission to create a world where Smart Meets Kind®. Using voice assistants and smart homes to transform people’s lives for the better by creating homes that care for us.
Check out our other skill ‘Kindspace - Track and Improve your Wellbeing’ in the Amazon Alexa Skill Store.
Get involved...
We hope you enjoy using this app. We’d love to know what else you’d like to see or any feedback that you have on the Alexa experience - let us know your thoughts at info@tltechsmart.com
Need more info on how to get the best out of your voice assistant? Find out more at https://www.tltechsmart.com/help/

And finally…
Please leave a review here if you enjoyed this skill.
